itemDescription: British author of crime thrillers set in the North of England

wikipedia_page.main: LJ Ross (the pen name of Louise Ross) is the bestselling author of the DCI Ryan series of romantic suspense thrillers. Her debut novel, Holy Island, was released in January 2015 and, by May, it had reached number one in the Amazon UK chart. Its sequel, Sycamore Gap, released in September 2015, is also a UK bestseller. She has released further books in the DCI Ryan series, amassing a further nine UK #1s, and she is reported to have sold over 4,000,000 copies.
